verbs.description: [ARG0: U.S. officials] [V: issued] [ARG1: a warning to the " caravan " of Central American migrants and their smugglers] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [C-ARG1: to not attempt crossing the border illegally] , or they 'll face prosecution . The group waited Monday in the city of Hermosillo in northern Mexico where they would board a train or take buses for the final 432 miles to the Mexico - U.S. border in California , Reuters reported . What are the details ? Over the last month , the caravan — which consists of mostly Honduran nationals — has dwindled from 1,500 to 600 after being abandoned by the organization , People Without Borders , that was leading them to the U.S. President Donald Trump ordered law enforcement officials not to allow the migrants into the country . “ Let today ’s message be clear : our nation has the most generous immigration system in the world , but this is a deliberate attempt to undermine our laws and overwhelm our system , " U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions said in a release …
